chart.name: chart.gst.unpaid.invoice.per.customer
chart.title: Unpaid invoice per customer
chart.dataset: select count(gi.status) as invoices,gp.name as name from gst_invoice gi,gst_party gp where gi.party=gp.id and gi.status in ('draft','validated') and gp.is_customer='t' and DATE(gi.datetime) between DATE(:toDateTime) and DATE(:fromDateTime) group by gp.name;

chart.name: chart.gst.paid.invoice.per.category.per.product
chart.title: Paid invoice per category per product
chart.dataset: select count(gil.item) as itemcount, gil.item as itemname, gpc.name as name from gst_invoice_line as gil, gst_invoice as gi, gst_product_category as gpc ,gst_product as gp where gi.status = 'paid' and gil.invoice = gi.id and gil.product = gp.id and gp.product_category = gpc.id and DATE(gi.datetime) between DATE(:toDateTime) and DATE(:fromDateTime) group by gil.item, gpc.name;

chart.name: chart.gst.customer.per.state
chart.title: Customer Per State
chart.dataset: select count(gp.is_customer) as customercount, gs.name as name from gst_party as gp, gst_address as ga, gst_state as gs where is_customer='t' and ga.party = gp.id and ga.state = gs.id group by gs.name;

chart.name: chart.gst.invoice.per.status.amount
chart.title: Invoice Per Status Amount
chart.dataset: select sum(gi.gross_amount) as amount,gi.status as status from gst_invoice as gi group by gi.status;

chart.name: chart.gst.invoice.per.status.number.of.invoice
chart.title: Invoice Per Status Number Of Invoice
chart.dataset: select count(gi.status) as statuscount,gi.status as status from gst_invoice as gi group by gi.status;
